website_summaries.verdict: It’s inexpensive, small, versatile, and records quality HD video.
pros: Stores up to 8 hours of footage with micro SD card
cons: Although this body camera recharges quickly, you’ll only get 3 hours of recording per charge

customer_reviews.title: Save by the video
customer_reviews.text: This camera save my husband from a big problem at work with a customer. On the bottoms seat almost to the front the car had a ripped on the seat but this video shows there wasn’t one when he deliver the car thanks to this body cam that fits it pocket or in front of chess made his job less stressful.
customer_reviews.author: Priscilla Tablas

customer_reviews.title: Decent picture quality
customer_reviews.text: Fairly intuitive to use, with decent picture and sound quality. It seems durable and has some accessories which make it easy to carry, but the clip option is my favorite. You do have to purchase an SD card which I wish was included. But other than that, pretty basic plug-and-play.
customer_reviews.author: Sampson

customer_reviews.title: Great little camera
customer_reviews.text: I was a little skeptical when I purchased this camera, as I previously purchased a 'police grade' camera and returned it. It's 1/4 the price and easy to use; great picture quality and voice is OK. Very unobtrusive, no one really knows your are wearing it. I do suggest you go to YouTube to figure out how to install and configure on your computer, as the directions you get with the camera are sketchy and not the best English. Overall a great value.
customer_reviews.author: D. S.

customer_reviews.title: great cam for the $$ only thing preventing it 5 stars
customer_reviews.text: is the lack of video stabilization. If you're on the move (as I use it for bicycle riding) it's shaky, and I mean extremely shaky -but that's the nature of any cams unless it has stabilization. So I had to download video software that has stabilization built in it, haven't used it yet though, but I wish the cam already had it. The microphone is EXTREMELY sensitive, will pick up whispers, the battery has lasted me over 1 hour and 45 min of bike riding and the picture quality is true 1080. all in all I'm happy***** UPDATE - HAD TO LOWER SCORE DUE TO IT DYING AFTER FOUR USES!
customer_reviews.author: JAMES KERRY

customer_reviews.title: Not what I expected. Retracting my review from positive to negative. Seller doesn't communicate.
customer_reviews.text: The product work for a month. I had problems with audio, recording, file not found for the device like it reset and wipes out all the files and after the USB port fails to be recognized. I reorder another one and return the first one same problem some came defective, use and broken. The USB port for this item stinks is not for standard USB ports it keeps falling off the socket. The seller doesn't have a number or answer his emails and Amazon seeks to resolve the problem with no relief or solution. The only solution Amazon.com offers is a refund. Don't bother with his product is not as good as they advertising.
customer_reviews.author: Jewel

customer_reviews.title: Broke after first use.
customer_reviews.text: As a retired cop I've used some real junk but this thing is pure crap. Such a great idea but it broke after the first use. Keep in mind that I am retired and I simply wanted this for extremely light use around the house for taking audio notes and nothing professional. The top button broke after pushing it lightly once. Do not waste any efforts on this junk.
customer_reviews.author: Castellucci

customer_reviews.title: Problematic
customer_reviews.text: Nowhere on the instruction sheet does it show where to insert the SD card. Very difficult to push the side-switch to power up. Changing from 720p to 1080p appears over-technical.
customer_reviews.author: Genghiz

customer_reviews.title: Good budget body camera
customer_reviews.text: It's a good budget body camera for the price. It's easy to operate as far as powering on, set to video or audio recording. Once you select which mode you want to record, to record you just press the button at the top to start and stop. The down side about the device is the picture quality. It's not the greatest, but it is passable. The directions for setting the time/date and loop recording on/off are not very clear, but there are videos that demonstrate how to do this. Just Google the Ehomful device (almost any one of them) and the setting direction are shown in most. This is a budget cam until you can afford better.
customer_reviews.author: AD_Rock

customer_reviews.title: Does not work
customer_reviews.text: Not sure why a lot of people gave this product high ratings. I purchased this product to use outside while on the move. The device stopped recording 40 seconds into first use outside. The video it recorded flickers with stills from a few seconds ago of the recording or it flickers with green/purple colors. It would not record anything the second time I used it. This really does not work for me. Don’t waste your money.
customer_reviews.author: Theo

customer_reviews.title: Not a good buy
customer_reviews.text: Even tho this camera was small enough not to be detected it didn’t work well enough to get a good video. It cut in and out and when I turned my body it stopped recording. Very disappointing
customer_reviews.author: Linda L. Fuller

customer_reviews.title: As advertised
customer_reviews.text: I bought a second one of these a while ago because it was the only reasonable one that takes a 128GB card that I could find (so I don't have to remember to turn it off/swap cards). It's been working perfectly, and as a light, unobtrusive dash cam, and velcroed to the inside of my rear window, it nicely captures everything front and back, even through the rear's smoked glass, and since it's small and black it's invisible. Battery life is awesome.
customer_reviews.author: bradly1101

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT BUY!
customer_reviews.text: Absolute junk. The instructions are poorly translated into English and are all but useless. The video quality is terrible and the videos freeze/skip randomly during playback. I didn't have high expectations for the price point, but this product is crap by "toy standards"; to even consider its use for anything serious would be an exercise in futility. Don't waste your money or your time.
customer_reviews.author: Eric Montgomery

customer_reviews.title: Extremely Happy with these small lightweight lapel cameras
customer_reviews.text: Ease of use. A Year ago I purchase small cameras and it took forever to get them to function. A button had to be pushed for so many seconds until it turned blue and then you were in some mode. THIS CAMERA IS EASY TO USE and takes EXCELLENT PICTURES AND VIDEO. Customer service is terrific. I spend thousands on my account and this has been one of the best experiences thus far. When I had a question, my mail didn't sit and the question was answered immediately. So easy to use, easy to set up. Love this little camera
customer_reviews.author: Cameron Younglove

customer_reviews.title: Zero Customer Service
customer_reviews.text: I would give this a good rating, but it died on me the second time I used it. Two months later. It wouldn't take a charge. After three emails to the manufacturer, they finally agreed to send me a replacement. That was two and a half months ago. Three more emails about the replacement have garnered no response. I give up. The unit itself worked well the one time I got to use it. My only complaint was that it broke down the recordings into five minute files. Rather annoying, but otherwise it worked well. However, if you get a defective unit, understand that they don't stand by their warranty. Caveat emptor!!
customer_reviews.author: Kevin Harlowe

customer_reviews.title: Great product.
customer_reviews.text: Truly a great product. We needed something low-key that also functioned well & provided decent enough pictures all without breaking the bank. This was able to provide everything we were looking for at an affordable price. 4 stars on the battery life, but don't let that discourage you. It still has alright battery life, but let's face it.. who doesn't want more battery life? Would purchase again if the need so arose.
customer_reviews.author: JVT

customer_reviews.title: Great cam
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my elderly mom after several contractors lied and tried to rip her off on home repairs. Now, she records every transaction. Audio and video work perfectly to capture the moment.
customer_reviews.author: N.M.

customer_reviews.title: Good little bodycam. High storage capacity
customer_reviews.text: This thing is a great little bodycam. Quality is about what I expected. It’s no go-pro, but the image and colors are pretty great for the price. Overall the image won’t compete with a smartphone, but in terms of filming for long periods, the battery life and storage will. It needs an SD card to work, but this allows you to achieve a very high amount of storage. It’s design is relatively inconspicuous, and fits easily into your pocket. I was impressed by the audio recording, but I’m not sure if it is mono or stereo. The lights that tell you when you are recording/charging and whatnot are a bit confusing.
customer_reviews.author: Alexa Kunde

customer_reviews.title: Cheap and Best
customer_reviews.text: What to Expect: 1. Camera with a USB , SD card with card reader, cleaning cloth and manual 2. It can record in 720 or 1080 HD clarity but you will have to follow the manual to do the necessary settings 3. It can record Video (this also records audio) but if you want to record just the audio, it does have a mode for it 4. Video format in AVI format with direct viewing capability when connected to computer What NOT to expect: 1. Video stabilization in motion, you need to keep it still while recording 2. Night vision
customer_reviews.author: VR A

customer_reviews.title: In today’s society have your own body cam.
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use. I did a welfare check when my nephew sent me a message asking for help. Made a mistake calling 911. Their ( officers) body cams was convenient corrupted. I refuse to be intimidated an use my body cam when driving through Fairview, Tn. These officers murdered my nephew! ALL officers should take the Crisis Intervention Training and stop playing trigger happy cops. They did not de escalate they had firemen bust open the door in the dark and both did kill shots.
customer_reviews.author: RebeccaWinner

customer_reviews.title: Not a bad little gadget.
customer_reviews.text: The video quality it surprisingly good. I tried another brand & wasn't nearly as happy & was gun-shy about trying another one. But am glad I did. It has a quality feel to it (which also makes it a little heavy if you're trying to put it in your shirt pocket) but overall, it's a decent buy. I actually have plans to use it as a hidden camera for pranks... the size is perfect & the design allow me hide it or tape it to something very easily. I had video I was going to upload but my computer is acting up. When I can get it to cooperate, I'll update the review with the footage.
customer_reviews.author: Pinktique

customer_reviews.title: Very pleased!
customer_reviews.text: Only reason i gave it one star is because it stopped wanting to charge after the third day .. Updated review !! After a couple months The manufacturer contacted me and apologized for the inconvenience he also wanted to make it up to me by sending a better product the WiFi cam he told me to give it a try and that’s been what I’m gonna do! I appreciate him even contacting me to let me know he really wanted customers satisfaction thank you mr Lee!
customer_reviews.author: Christine Reed

customer_reviews.title: Good, convenient body cam
customer_reviews.text: I'm a game developer, and I often take footage of actions I want to animate. This camera has been about perfect to take footage from multiple angles in conjunction with other cameras. The clip on the front is super convenient, so you can clip it to your collar or front facing pocket and get decent POV angles. I also liked that it also functions as a USB drive (that also charges as you leave it plugged in). Makes it super convenient to work with, as it's a matter of seconds between recording and having the footage ready on your computer.
customer_reviews.author: Nate

customer_reviews.title: DISAPPOIINTED
customer_reviews.text: UNFORTUNATELY, I had to return this item. It appears that it is made for a man and the neck string is way to long. Also it is not permitted to be used in the USA for some reason and shortly after filming about 3 times, it stopped working. They did accept my refund. I think it is a nice camera, but not for anyone that wears blouses with no pockets. Like I said, the good news is that they did refund me.
customer_reviews.author: Lena Allen

customer_reviews.title: Performs As Promised
customer_reviews.text: The video quality is very good. Easy to use and I like that they included a card reader to make it easier to remove video from the card without having to plug the whole camera into the computer. Minus 1 star as I had some difficulty being able to set the date and time functions. After a few attempts and an email to the company, the formatting finally stayed. I haven't messed with the "settings.txt" file yet. I'm currently only using a 1gb memory card, as that's all I had available. I've ordered a 64gb card and I'll see how that works. Overall, a great body camera for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Steve C.

customer_reviews.title: Not good on lanyard
customer_reviews.text: If using a lanyard it’s pointless it’s flips around constantly and hard to tell if it’s recording or not would not buy again wish I could return you basically have to hold it if on a lanyard I use for Grubhub and hard when both hands are full but pictures does work great just never knowing if recording or not
customer_reviews.author: Kailaphx

customer_reviews.title: Works ok.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my brother that is a police officer. He said one day that he thought he should maybe have something like it so I purchased this one. For the price he said it works OK. His only real complaint is that it dont record video very well at night. It's really just kinda hit and miss there. For a day time police officer this would be great. One other thing, I don't really know why but Amazon wouldn't ship this to his po box I had to get it sent to my house then take it over. I'm sure they had reasons I guess.
customer_reviews.author: The Drifter

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT BUY!
customer_reviews.text: I am a Very Upset Customer! First one ordered did not work nor did I receive the SD Card as described which is included. Amazon replaced everything. Nothing works, will NOT CHARGE & NO SD CARD WAS INCLUDED! A complete waste of $43.00. NOT SATISFIED WITH 2 MOTION CAMS & AGAIN ITEM DESCRIBES AN SD CARD IS INCLUDED...IT IS NOT X'S TWO. Not as described...Nothing works
customer_reviews.author: Tammy Rhoads

customer_reviews.title: Good quality
customer_reviews.text: Difficult to tell when it is recording or not. I found myself recording or not recording when wanting to do the opposite. Video quality was good and it was easy to connect to download the videos. If you clip it into a shirt pocket, the weight caused it to tilt at an angle instead of straight ahead recording. Pockets need to add a stiffner to keep the camera pointed ahead.
customer_reviews.author: Tim T.

customer_reviews.title: Smile your on candid camera
customer_reviews.text: Was looking for something small to fit in pocket that had a long battery life and this was the perfect one. The clarity of the pics are outstanding. It is very easy to set up and use a s comes with everything you need to use, transfer and or label and edit your pics. It’s a plug and play unit and will fit just about anywhere and could go unnoticed for sure. Very sturdy and a great product for the cost.
customer_reviews.author: Audre H

customer_reviews.title: Buy A Real Civilian Body Camera...
customer_reviews.text: This camera is in-operable out of the box, I do not have a problem with buying an extra memory card... BUT to be able to conduct a live video with sound & vision YOU MUST have a MEMORY CARD...... (your smart Phone is more effective...) The Instruction Manual is written in BROKEN ENGLISH... Returning....NEXT!!!! Please do a proper Search For "Civilian Body Camera", you will obtain better results...
customer_reviews.author: BradWallace

customer_reviews.title: An outstanding quality on the camera
customer_reviews.text: I was really surprised to see how great this worked, it was so easy to set up and allowed a bunch of options to save the footage. The quality of video was also outstanding and gave a crisp clean picture. I tried it both “spy” style (without letting anyone know) and to tape a meeting. Both times I had crisp clean visuals and finish on the video. Overall a great buy and highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Clarity Reviews

customer_reviews.title: Clip needs improvement - all else is great. GREAT CUSTOMER SERVICE!
customer_reviews.text: The design is great! The ease of use is great (although I was unsuccessful removing/altering the time stamp)! Durable, rugged. Picture quality is great! Fits in your hand well and attaches to your backpack, pocket, clothes well. The only issues I had were the timestamp and the clip. The timestamp I never was able to fix. The clip broke after two uses. I was unable to repair and in attempting to repair, apparently damaged the electronics. GREAT CUSTOMER SERVICE!
customer_reviews.author: J. Nations

customer_reviews.title: Very handy to have
customer_reviews.text: Super awesome device. I love how small it is- about half the size of a pen and can easily clip to yours shirt or wherever you want. There have been so many times that I wanted to have a little camera to sneak a recording. I was so surprised at how affordable it is. It was also easy to set up and use. The Quality is good and it was easy to put on my computer. It is good to have for emergencies or everyday random fun
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Watson

customer_reviews.title: pretty darn good
customer_reviews.text: Works better than expected and better than some reviews here. My version seems improved over what the manual says, and setup is easier or unneeded (max resolution is now the default). A little hard to keep aimed forward and level since will spin on lanyard or sag heavily with shirt clip. I will get max 64gb sdcard in order to also have plenty space to record aftermath of an incident with body/dash cam.
customer_reviews.author: j-thor

customer_reviews.title: Better camera then expected
customer_reviews.text: Overall great product for the price. Very sturdy ans heavy duty( again surprising for the price). Camera quality was alot better than expected as well as sound. I was expecting it to be extremely pixilated, it was not. I was also expecting sound to be way off like a bad movie and it wasn't either. Just don't forget the extra SD card to save videos, luckily I have several lying around the house.
customer_reviews.author: Allison Chandler

customer_reviews.title: Video quality, Price!!!
customer_reviews.text: Firs of all I was very impressed with the quality of this camera it feels very solid. Very easy to set up and use. Also i was not expecting such great video quality from a low cost camera. great camera for the price.And one of it's great features it that you can just slide off the bottom and stick it in a USB port. I would recommend everyone to buy this Spy camera Great Price,Great Video Quality,Easy to Use.Worth the PRICE!!!
customer_reviews.author: QobilMedia

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use
customer_reviews.text: User friendly interface, turn on solid light on when record the light blink and off. It can record voice or video with sound. Videos quality by default 720p, but we can change on computer.
customer_reviews.author: David Aing

customer_reviews.title: One good way to capture funny moments
customer_reviews.text: Who would of thought it has such thing like this. Lmao. I bought it for fun and uses on party with my friends. Funny how I capture their funny moments and showed them the next day. My friends are surpriced and wondered how in the world I got them in video. Very easy to use with just one click, it will start recording.
customer_reviews.author: eunice

customer_reviews.title: Really neat and portable recorder
customer_reviews.text: I am surprised by the quality of this tiny camera. I bought this device for some everyday general procedure recording, and I tested the quality by recording my cooking. I was satisfied with its vision in dim light, and the fast USB charging and the included 32GB micro SD card are definitely pluses. It would be just better if the weight and thickness can be reduced a little bit for easier carrying. Overall, I am happy with the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Jason Deng

customer_reviews.title: Very good.
customer_reviews.text: This body cam is more amazing than I thought when I got it! It can run with the best. It records quality video and good audio. The pictures are clear enough to record necessary features. The one button push for video recording, picture taking, and stand alone audio recording are easy to push when needed. I would recommend this product to anyone who us considering this.
customer_reviews.author: ERIC

customer_reviews.title: Finally! A Mini Camera That Works!
customer_reviews.text: Solid heft, easy to use, easy to transfer video files, and the quality of the videos is just amazing. I’ve bought half a dozen mini cameras before and they all turned out to be junk. This one is the real thing. Worth every penny. I had an issue with the camera and the company's customer service department was incredibly responsive.
customer_reviews.author: J. Lansche

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use and great quality
customer_reviews.text: Basically I am a simple person and I love all my stuffs to be simple especially when I use/operate it. I am so impressed with this camera. The design is so slim, compact and easy for me to carry it wherever I go. I can just slip it into my jeans pocket. Speaking about how to operate it, all you need just push to buttons then here you go to start recording. Of course result is the most essential and I can tell the result is so spectacular. I am so glad and satisfy with the result. I love it and I would recommend to my friends if they need a mini camera but amazing quality.
customer_reviews.author: Steven Susanto

customer_reviews.title: Compact and discreet
customer_reviews.text: Very practical. You need a SD card to use it, but then it's a breeze, since you only need to plug in the computer to charge and see your videos. You can easily hide this camera if you need to, since the black of the paint is not too shine it will blend with almost any background. Easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: AlexSB

customer_reviews.title: Nice Pocket Sized Camera
customer_reviews.text: This is a nice, sleek pocket sized camera. It fits easily into your pocket and on a bag. It comes with an attachable string/handle and some other accessories (cleaning cloth, USB). I like that it has audio and video recorder that records for a good while ~ 4 hours. The SD card isn’t included so you’d have to purchase that separately.
customer_reviews.author: AshleyM3710

customer_reviews.title: Great product.
customer_reviews.text: No need extra cable. The USB port is on the camera body,which made it so convenient for charging or data transferring to my laptop.I can clip it on my clothes or wear it around my neck with the lanyard.It is so easy to use,switch the audio or video button,press the START,then it is ready to work.I used it to record my flight about 2 hrs,very clear,the file was saved every 5 mins.If this one can connect with my mic,but with this size of body and this price,it is impossible.Anyhow,It is good enough.
customer_reviews.author: Celeste

customer_reviews.title: Meh
customer_reviews.text: For the price I suppose this is ok. I don’t understand why it can record video OR audio, but not both at the same time. Very weird.
customer_reviews.author: Beverly Blue

customer_reviews.title: Useful most everywhere
customer_reviews.text: I use this bodycam for fishing trips or whenever I go outside, it's more compact and discreet than using the phone. So far it has worked well, with both video and sounds clear and the battery lasts longer than I expected. Will give update a few months later to see how it performed after many usages.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin Le

customer_reviews.title: Compact Camera With Good Quality
customer_reviews.text: The camera is small and easy to hide while maintaining good picture quality. Its great to have for discrete recording. Its also great just to keep around for those times you have an important event going on and you need to keep notes and recordings of something. Had nothing but good experiences with this camera and would recommend anyone looking at picking one of these up to just go for it, you wont regret it.
customer_reviews.author: Joey Sebastian

customer_reviews.title: Great People to work With!
customer_reviews.text: This is the camera I have been looking for! It's the perfect size to fit in a pocket, has good battery life, and appears to be durable. TI had some early technical issues, but the people (Jessica) went far out of her way to help, and after a computer crash and a long week that just started, it was a great feeling to have someone care about my small issue, which was fixed lightning fast. Thanks to All involved!
customer_reviews.author: TNJedi

customer_reviews.title: Pretty good quality, cannot change recording watermark
customer_reviews.text: Super easy to use, 1 click to start recording and other click to stop recording. The 2nd pic is the image quality. Include 32GB micro card, USB port is for charging and transfer data. Little bit big than normal Flash drive, can do video and voice recording.
customer_reviews.author: Chenmi

customer_reviews.title: Decent value for the money
customer_reviews.text: Decent value for the money, came as promised. Doesn't handle motion too well, so videoing while walking doesn't work as well as standing still. Design is nice, the direct-to-USB feature makes it easy to use. Picture is very good when not walking with it.
customer_reviews.author: Timothy Mccune

customer_reviews.title: What an excellent seller. Very very helpful.
customer_reviews.text: I am very impressed with the merchant more-so than the camera. Would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Walker Texas 210

customer_reviews.title: Clear Voice and View
customer_reviews.text: The night vision was clear just as the voice recordings are clear. The instructions on setup are easy to read. Nice video images. It has an easy to charge USB port plus it has SD slot. This camera does it all. Great buy for any video footage capturing.
customer_reviews.author: Antoinette  Yarbrough

customer_reviews.title: Nice catch!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this pure out of curiosity and it works very well. It comes with a SD card and it is made in pretty high quality. Clear vision and easy to read or export from it. Will explore more case use for that but overall pretty satisfied with this product.
customer_reviews.author: Noah Yao

customer_reviews.title: poor quality product and very short warranty
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this product in July 2019, and the Return Product Support ended Jan. 2020. So they standby their product for only months. Since the product support was expired, I opened the camera and found the record button no longer triggered the recording mechanism. In trying to re-establish the connection, the recording mechanism broke off. This was not a good product if within 6 months of use, this mechanism failes.
customer_reviews.author: No Name

customer_reviews.title: Compact and reasonably priced
customer_reviews.text: I bought this camera to record family members telling stories about their lives and service in the military. Its cheaper than a full size video camera and not distracting when being taped so it's more natural. The battery is rechargeable in your computer.
customer_reviews.author: Renee_Rocks

customer_reviews.title: Exceptional video quality
customer_reviews.text: This camera fits in your shirt pocket and looks like a usb flash drive. The video quality is excellent. I did have a problem with my HP laptop not recognizing the device, but that was my laptop usb driver problem. It worked in my desktop and two other similar laptops without a problem. Support help from the manufacturer was excellent and believe me, they are there to help you every step of the way. I can't say enough about the support.
customer_reviews.author: Jim Neese

customer_reviews.title: Good quality, just secure it well.
customer_reviews.text: Seemed like a high quality build. Unfortunately before I had a chance to use it, it fell out of my shirt pocket immediately and hit the corner next to the button, destroyed the led and the button didn't function afterwards. I can't give it a low rating due it ultimately being my fault , but beware, a fall from 3 feet on to pavement will most likely render it useless. So be careful when it is on your person.
customer_reviews.author: Gary Arney

customer_reviews.title: Very useful for the price (see additional instructions in review)
customer_reviews.text: With revised instructions, camera worked well. Video is clear and audio pickup is very good. As the camera is small and the lens is wide-angle, best results are obtained when the camera is stationary (set on a table or other object), or hand-held without fast movement. Camera is not noticeable when in front of a black background, such as dark clothing or a cellphone's black screen. Controls are simple and easy, one slide-switch for off/on/video & audio/audio only, one button to start/stop recording. SETTINGS file format is "1,1,1", keep in mind the file disappears when the camera is turned on, but the setting are retained in the camera.
customer_reviews.author: meg

customer_reviews.title: DON'T BUY!
customer_reviews.text: Attach to your lapel and it records your chin. Let it hand with the lanyard and it records your shirt because all it does is turn backwards. Complete waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: Brett Shepherd

customer_reviews.title: Battery life
customer_reviews.text: UPDATE: customer service from the seller was exceptional. They are willing to work with the client to make the experience great no matter what the outcome. I really appreciated this I returned this product because the battery life wasn’t acceptable to me. The product lasts 2-3 hours and I wanted something a little longer.
customer_reviews.author: Adam D

customer_reviews.title: for recording situations i may not otherwise be able to record with phone
customer_reviews.text: i got this to have as back up to my phone. It was simple to set up, the picture quality is satisfactory. Mainly i got this to record my families reactions on Christmas. Sometimes holding phone up to record leaves you out of the moment and this will record all of that.
customer_reviews.author: Molda

customer_reviews.title: Video is very clear sound is good
customer_reviews.text: Works for what I needed, place of employment full of two face manager, need to cover my ass with harassment and bullying, Sad world. But works great, have issue setting the dates, instruction little off
customer_reviews.author: AJ

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: It’s pretty good in general, better quality if the camera is stabilized. Has two moods, filming and voice recording. Easy to use, switch the button, the light flash blue, start recording. Comes with the memory card, put it in, and ready to use.
customer_reviews.author: chloe zeng

customer_reviews.title: excellent camera, excellent instructions
customer_reviews.text: it is really funny to walk around wearing this. even though it is fairly long, when its around your neck, no one seems to notice at all. i always worry about having sufficient instructions. these are well written, in english and illustrated. its intuitive and easy to use. this was a fun buy and it will be a constant companion on weekends.
customer_reviews.author: marypatric

customer_reviews.title: It’s fun
customer_reviews.text: I am very enjoy using this slim magnetic pocket camera. You can stick it on your refrigerator, dishwasher, or clip it to your front pocket. This camera can take video or pictures. Everything is super easy to view on a computer. We liked this camera so much that we purchased two of them.
customer_reviews.author: Andy sun

customer_reviews.title: Useful for my work
customer_reviews.text: I like to wear this to my security job. That way when something happens I have the video to prove my side. It's easy to clip onto your shirt and comes with a easy-to-use app. I think this would be useful for other kinds of jobs as well.
customer_reviews.author: Katie

customer_reviews.title: Good for what you pay
customer_reviews.text: The body camera has performed as expected and what you would expect for the price. The audio could be a touch better and pocket clip could be a little tighter It is very easy to use and would recommend it to anyone who would like video any interaction for personal or professional reasons.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Adams

customer_reviews.title: Really good audio and video recording device.
customer_reviews.text: Perfect device to record class and take notes in your computer. Takes clear video and audio. But i use it mostly for my class audio, so I can roam around when my online class is in session. It comes with 32GB micro SD card.
customer_reviews.author: Harshil

customer_reviews.title: 5 Minutes take up ONE Gigabyte! No way!
customer_reviews.text: The video quality is good. However, in this time anyone is interested in sending videos using a cellular phone. IMPOSSIBLE to save it to your PC or Cloud and them send it to a phone. Every 5 minutes of video takes ONE Gigabyte!!!!! No way! One hour of a good video in MP4 takes a few MBs. I know there are converters, but it is too much time to be worthy. I do not recommend it, if you want to store your videos or send them by email or WhatsApp.
customer_reviews.author: Joe

customer_reviews.title: Small, picture quality
customer_reviews.text: Just recently purchased this little camera. primarily for recording who's been touching my desk after I left work. the picture quality is surprisingly good for the price.its size is really small, could fit anywhere. Its ease of use and multipurpose use (could also be used as audio recorder) are fantastic.
customer_reviews.author: Icesicle

customer_reviews.title: This body camera is easy to use
customer_reviews.text: This body camera is easy to use, the effect is clear, and it is relatively easy to operate, whether it is carried out or monitored at home. The only regret is that I need to buy a mini SD card. If it include, it will be perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Diablo

customer_reviews.title: It does the job well
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this for a fun diy project at home. It works well and has been recording the video and audio with good quality. There is a lack of stabilization as noted in other reviews, but if you keep it somewhat steady it works very nicely. Happy with the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Swapnil S.

customer_reviews.title: Returning product.
customer_reviews.text: Didn't come in instructions and I can't get any assistance on changing from 720 factory set to 1080. Picture quality in 720 is poor and battery life is pretty short.
customer_reviews.author: BuzzardBreath

customer_reviews.title: Rechargeable mini spy camera
customer_reviews.text: This camera is mini, so you can hide this camera to keep an eye on whatever you want, or it can be attached to your person and used for a body camera. The instructions on the camera are the best, and the buttons don't match the camera, which could be a problem for someone that's technically challenging. The camera requires an sd card which not included with the device. You can take videos or set up for motion with a few touches of the buttons. What out nanny I have my eye on you.
customer_reviews.author: Dennis Mark

customer_reviews.title: Lighter weight
customer_reviews.text: As an update to my previous review. I believe this camera has much improved. It is much lighter in weight. I like the swivel lens. Mic is very directional. Good quality video. I also like the fact that I can record while it's plugged in, keeping charge, if I choose to use it in an inconspicuous area.
customer_reviews.author: BMacIver

customer_reviews.title: Great little camera
customer_reviews.text: this little thing is great while I’m using public transportation. It’s easy to setup and use . You can just plug it directly to your laptop and download the videos you took . It also came with a usb micro as card reader. This was a good purchase
customer_reviews.author: Nad

customer_reviews.title: Great body cam!
customer_reviews.text: The case is very tough and will clearly take a beating and keep on ticking...LOL. Buttons are easily accessed and offer easy operation without taking your eyes off the situation at hand. It comes with two clips including one with shirt button hook to further secure the cam to your body. Screen is clear and menu is very easy to navigate.
customer_reviews.author: Elisa Encisco

customer_reviews.title: Great camera and customer service!
customer_reviews.text: It’s a nice little gadget that shoots high quality video. I had trouble understanding the poorly written instruction manual and contacted support. They were most helpful, replied to my emails quickly and helped me resolve my issues.
customer_reviews.author: Neal M.

customer_reviews.title: Awesome product for the price
customer_reviews.text: Used this for the first time today and I was blown away. I was surprised with the picture quality! This was super easy to use, setting the date and time stamp was a breeze. The product itself feels solid and durable. Even comes with a cloth to keep the lense clean. This camera is definately a steal for the price!
customer_reviews.author: Grason

customer_reviews.title: The DATE setting keep reverting back to "2017-03-28,23:59:59 "
customer_reviews.text: The DATE setting keep reverting back to "2017-03-28,23:59:59 ". There doesn't seem to be anyway of fixing this issue.
customer_reviews.author: Mt.Fuji San

customer_reviews.title: Complete Garbage.
customer_reviews.text: It doesn't work at all. It created 30gb of files and only one 1gb file was playable and the quality was bad. And the playtime was 2 minutes long only. It's complete garbage
customer_reviews.author: RogerOverAndOut

customer_reviews.title: Very light weight
customer_reviews.text: This body camera is very light weighted. It's pretty comfortable to carry around your uniform. The image of the camera is pretty good and the sound quality is alright. I wish the light wasn't there. It's really distracting for me but it's a pretty good device overall :)
customer_reviews.author: Jayden

customer_reviews.title: Not very good
customer_reviews.text: I had it on for about an hour. The videos were shot in 5 minute blocks so there were multiple files in the SD card. Half of the files i could not view on my Mac. I erased all the files then restarted with new new videos and I could not view ALL on my mac. It doesn't work very well so I AM RETURNING IT. It's made in China fyi.
customer_reviews.author: Vince R.

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use
customer_reviews.text: It took me a while to figure out how to use. However, it only have few bottoms and easy to use after you read the instruction. I don’t think it has night vision, but the picture quality is fine. It also has recording option. And it come with the SD and the SD adapter so no worries to buy another one.
customer_reviews.author: Mimie

customer_reviews.title: Save your money.
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this camera A long while back and haven’t been able to use it. It just doesn’t work. I wasted my money. I would never buy this product again.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: BAD BAD BAD
customer_reviews.text: This product does not work. I charged it just like the directions say and the light on top doesn’t come on. I am unable to video and record
customer_reviews.author: Christine

customer_reviews.title: Great idea, terrible quality
customer_reviews.text: I attempted to use this camera on a molle plate carrier. Recorded for a few hours and all looked fine. However, every single video file was corrupted. Most couldn't even be played and the few that could had no audio track. Reformatted the camera and tried again, same result. Returned for a refund.
customer_reviews.author: Michael

customer_reviews.title: Exceptional  price, Great  product,
customer_reviews.text: This camera has exceptional video clarity . I am very happy with my purchase. I really like the USB feature that allows me to both charge my camera and to download content to my computer. I am confident that this camera meets my needs as a security bodycam device. Tech support with this company is awesome ! They are quick to respond to questions ; and it is clear they stand behind their products. I will purchase more security cameras from this company in the future.
customer_reviews.author: RandyWilson

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't work. No one to call for help.
customer_reviews.text: Dropbox can't find video or Pic. Who do I call to help me? So far very disappointed.... Was going to use this on a sailing race but that's not going to happen with out help...
customer_reviews.author: Nevillejw

customer_reviews.title: Long battery life 3+ hours I think
customer_reviews.text: So has excellent battery life. Quality is pretty good. Comes with 32 g memory card! Cons....it bounces around quite a bit while around your neck. Needs to be better secured. I will have to secure it better somehow.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: Great for meetings.
customer_reviews.text: Love it. Got it so I could record some meetings and have a quick way to capture info. It’s working well for helping me take notes later after.
customer_reviews.author: Sam & Delia

customer_reviews.title: Cheap items
customer_reviews.text: Video quality not good! Most of my recordings will say that it cannot be viewed. Quality of material feels cheap. Over all this item produced cheap results.
customer_reviews.author: Norman

customer_reviews.title: I like it well enough that I'm considering getting a second one.
customer_reviews.text: After looking at several cameras, I'm glad I decided on this one. It's a good size, can hold a charge for a decent amount of time, and has a clip to attach to things with a movable camera. The video/picture quality is also a plus and I was shocked at the audio quality!This does an above average job. The video is much clearer than more expensive models.I recommend as a good low priced option.
customer_reviews.author: dylan

customer_reviews.title: Nice form factor, decent video/audio, poor build quality
customer_reviews.text: UPDATE: The seller contacted me and sent me a new one. This one hasn't broke, but no one has tried to yank it out of my coat pocket either. The lens is built into the clip you hook onto your pocket. A fine idea, but the clip itself is separate from the body. So with very little pull--say by someone who wants to hurt you and not be filmed doing it--one can break off the clip. And then take the lens with it. I have great video of the person assaulting me, but now I can't use the camera anymore.
customer_reviews.author: Steven Rogers

customer_reviews.title: Clip broke off
customer_reviews.text: Great little camera for the price. Use it for dog walking in the woods. second day of ownership and the clip broke off?? Put Velcro on the back and now I place it where I want to on my field jacket.
customer_reviews.author: TIMOTHY

customer_reviews.title: Worked well at first but broke after a month and a half
customer_reviews.text: Picture quality was good, I was impressed by that and night vision. However, the on/off button broke within 5 weeks, and then the recording ceased altogether shortly thereafter. Unfortunately, because it was out of the return period Amazon could not replace and I could not find the manufacturer contact info. Do NOT recommend, cheaply made, should not break within 2 months. Ridiculous.
customer_reviews.author: tcons

customer_reviews.title: Most need at a meeting
customer_reviews.text: This camera is the best pocket camera video. I bought 3 different cameras a for meeting and this one worked the best. The video was clearest and audio the best sounding.
customer_reviews.author: Lawrence DiFrancesco

customer_reviews.title: Good product, Good Value
customer_reviews.text: This Pen Cam works very well (better than I expected). The image is good and the view angle is wide enough for use while riding a bicycle or motorcycle. The audio is pretty good as well. Run time on a full charge is well over 2 hours. Note: there are several online videos that clearly explain how to setup and use this camera (and others like it).
customer_reviews.author: Eline

customer_reviews.title: Awesome product
customer_reviews.text: After a little help from support I got this setup, BTW the support as quick and good. The quality is very good for the price, it has audio with the video, or you can just do a voice recording. Comes on quickly and it's a blue light for video and green light for just audio. Handy little product.
customer_reviews.author: Todd Williams

product_meta.title: Body Camera HD 1080P, Ehomful Wearable Mini Spy Camera Wireless,Portable Pen Cop Pocket Cam ,USB Video Recorder Plug and Play,with 32GB MicroSD Card Class 10
feature_bullets: This mini body camera is a truly powerful security gadget that looks and works like a normal USB flash drive. The cop spy cam is designed with a sturdy clip anchored around the lens, You can wear the personal body camera on your clothes.Alternatively you can keep the wearable spy camera in your pocket, on your desk, wear around your neck with lanyard for travel (lanyard is included in the box) or practically anywhere discreetly.

Cop Spy Cam Easy shooting with one click on the go: Press top button to record or pause.The personal body camera features 120 Degree field of view.The LED indicator is located conveniently on beside the top button.For using like a mini hidden body camera, the LED will only flash dimly 3 times and then turn off to indicate video recording has started.The werable camera has flashing light during recording.The wearable camera record stunning 1080p@30fps HD video with no blurry footage.

Body Cameras Full functioning flash drive : with USB plug, you can plug cop spy cam into your computer and easily upload the videos or just recharging. Body cameras record and store up to 8 hours of video with a 64GB micro SD CARD(Not Included) with loop recording. The police body cameras supports up to 64GB Micro SD card at maximum.(32GB SD card is included in the box).date time stamping enabled on your video.

Hidden body Camera A portable device: powered by a rechargeable lithium battery that lasts up to 3 hours of recording time.Body cameras can be quickly recharged from any PC or USB port. It can be also charged while recording.

How to utilize Mini body camera: get cop spy cam hidden capture when you are trying to compile evidence in the event of a home break-in. Body cameras keep a closer eye on the Nanny who watches your children.Prove your case if you are being harassed by your neighbors, co-workers or strangers. The wearable camera records your interview from either side for improving your skills. Protect your rights and job while dealing with in any sort of business.
